name: Changli
nickname: An error occurred. Please contact our Customer Service for assistance.

talent.name: Eternal Blaze
talent.description:
Evaluation Basis: [Resonance Assessment 2326-G]

The precise timing of Resonator Changli's Awakening remains uncertain. Reports indicate that Resonator Changli displayed early signs of fire manipulation during her childhood, often struggling to control it. However, as Changli matured into adulthood, the frequency and stability of these manifestations notably improved.

Resonator Changli's Tacet Mark is situated on her lower chest. Post-Awakening examinations have identified specific alterations in her physical attributes. These include a gradual fading of hair color at the tips and feather-like burn marks on her left arm, emitting a fiery glow influenced by her Forte.

The Resonance Spectrum Pattern of Changli mirrors the characteristics of fire, displaying a robust Syntony reaction in testing. Despite the exact trigger for her Awakening remaining uncertain, no other sample with a Resonance Spectrum Pattern similarity exceeding 60% has been identified. Resonator Changli's Forte aligns closely with the mythical spirit bird from Huanglong folklore, possibly influenced by her early immersion in tales related to this legendary creature.

Resonator Changli possesses the unique ability to compress flames into delicate feather-shaped projectiles. Her Forte, once unleashed, has the power to create scorching fires of exceptional heat, capable of devastating a large area. A telltale sign that her Forte is active is the emergence of a lone fiery feather with an eye-like pattern on her forehead, which she describes as the "Mind's Eye."

Analysis of test samples has revealed a non-convergent Rabelle's Curve with a stable rise. Occasional fluctuations within normal range have been detected. Therefore, Changli is identified as a Natural Resonator.

combo_teaching.title: Changli: <color=#d4bf5f>Basic Attack</color> Tutorial
combo_teaching.description:
Perform up to 4 consecutive attacks, dealing <color=Fire>Fusion DMG</color>.
After releasing <color=Highlight>Basic Attack Stage 4</color>, Changli enters <color=Highlight>True Sight</color>, lasting for 12s.
When in <color=Highlight>True Sight</color>, if Changli uses <color=Highlight>Ground Basic Attack</color>, she releases <color=Highlight>True Sight: Conquest</color>, rapidly approaching the enemy and dealing <color=Fire>Fusion DMG</color>, considered as Resonance Skill DMG. When dealing damage, Changli obtains 1 stack of [Enflamement]. After releasing <color=Highlight>True Sight: Conquest</color>, <color=Highlight>True Sight</color> ends.

combo_teaching.title: Changli: <color=#d4bf5f>Basic Attack</color> Tutorial
combo_teaching.description:
Perform up to 4 consecutive attacks, dealing <color=Fire>Fusion DMG</color>.
After releasing <color=Highlight>Basic Attack Stage 4</color>, Changli enters <color=Highlight>True Sight</color>, lasting for 12s.
When in <color=Highlight>True Sight</color>, if Changli <color=Highlight>jumps</color> or uses <color=Highlight>Basic Attack</color> in mid-air, she releases <color=Highlight>True Sight: Charge</color>, dashing towards the enemy and dealing <color=Fire>Fusion DMG</color>, considered as Resonance Skill DMG. When dealing damage, Changli obtains 1 stack of [Enflamement]. After releasing <color=Highlight>True Sight: Charge</color>, <color=Highlight>True Sight</color> ends.

combo_teaching.title: Changli: <color=#d4bf5f>Resonance Skill</color> Tutorial
combo_teaching.description: After releasing <color=Highlight>Resonance Skill</color>, Changli rapidly attacks the enemy and enters <color=Highlight>True Sight</color>, lasting for 12s. In the end, Changli releases a plunging attack, dealing <color=Fire>Fusion DMG</color>.

combo_teaching.title: Changli: <color=#d4bf5f>Resonance Skill</color> Tutorial
combo_teaching.description: After releasing <color=Highlight>Resonance Skill</color>, Changli rapidly attacks the enemy and enters <color=Highlight>True Sight</color>, lasting for 12s. In the end, Changli releases a plunging attack, dealing <color=Fire>Fusion DMG</color>.

combo_teaching.title: Changli: <color=#d4bf5f>Mid-air Attack</color> Tutorial
combo_teaching.description:
Consume STA to perform up to 4 consecutive attacks in mid-air, dealing <color=Fire>Fusion DMG</color>.
After releasing <color=Highlight>Mid-air Attack Stage 4</color>, Changli enters <color=Highlight>True Sight</color>, lasting for 12s.

combo_teaching.title: Changli: <color=#d4bf5f>Heavy Attack</color> Tutorial
combo_teaching.description: Hold <color=Highlight>Basic Attack</color> on the ground to consume STA to perform an upward strike, dealing <color=Fire>Fusion DMG</color>. Use <color=Highlight>Basic Attack</color> within a certain time to release <color=Highlight>Mid-air Attack Stage 3</color>.

combo_teaching.title: Changli: <color=#d4bf5f>Enhanced Heavy Attack</color> Tutorial
combo_teaching.description: When releasing <color=Highlight>Heavy Attack</color>, if Changli carries 4 stacks of [Enflamement], she consumes all stacks of [Enflamement] to release <color=Highlight>Flaming Sacrifice</color>, dealing <color=Fire>Fusion DMG</color>, considered as Resonance Skill DMG.

combo_teaching.title: Changli: <color=#d4bf5f>Resonance Liberation</color> Tutorial
combo_teaching.description:
Deal <color=Fire>Fusion DMG</color> to nearby targets, obtaining 4 stacks of [Enflamement], and entering <color=Highlight>Fiery Feather</color>.
<size=40><color=Title>Fiery Feather</color></size>
When Changli releases Heavy Attack <color=Highlight>Flaming Sacrifice</color> within 10s, her ATK is increased, after which <color=Highlight>Fiery Feather</color> ends.
